::Autofire::

Flying into the scene behind Adrax, Autofire looks around, spotting a red 
flyer attacking his counterpart. His eyes narrow, seeing Megatron in the 
area. Adrax seemed to be dealing well with the bots on the ground, though.

"Autofire, TERRORIZE!!"

Transforming into his robot mode, Autofire takes out a sword, flying at the 
red bot.

Getting near him, he slashes at him with the sword, the cannon on his 
shoulder firing at him.
